subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|れい}}

: 例 ([[ためし]], [[tameshi]])
: 例し (ためし, tameshi)

The most common reading is れい (rei).

# [[example]], [[instance]]
#* 例を[[引く]] <nowiki>[</nowiki>[[挙げる]]<nowiki>]</nowiki>
#*: れいをひく[あげる]
#*: rei o hiku [ageru]
#*: cite [give] an example
# [[illustration]]
# [[case]]
# [[custom]], the [[usual]]
#* 例によって
#*: れいによって
#*: rei ni yotte
#*: as usual
#* 例に無く
#*: れいになく
#*: rei ni naku
#*: contrary to habit
# [[precedent]]
# [[that]]
#* 例の[[男]]
#*: れいのおとこ
#*: rei no otoko
#*: that man (who we were speaking about)

subSections.title: Readings
